description: Whip up a delicious spiced beef tortilla wrap with creamy avocado and crunchy Mexican-style salad. Try this easy recipe for a tasty dinner in a hurry.
name: Easy Beef & Mexican-Style Salad Tortilla Pockets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375g Old El Paso tortilla pockets kit
1 avocado, destoned, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat tortilla pockets according to packet instructions.
Meanwhile, prepare salad kit according to packet directions.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook beef, in batches, for 2 minutes or until browned and almost cooked through. Return beef and seasoning (from kit) to pan and cook, stirring, for 30 seconds or until fragrant.
Fill pockets with beef, avocado, half the salad and a small dollop of salsa (from kit). Serve with remaining salad and remaining salsa.
